name: Tossable Digits
overview:
Tossable Digits offers customers affordable Virtual Phone Numbers that forward to the customerâ€™s existing home, cell, or office phone. This allows customers to keep their real phone number private and secret, because callers never know the real number they are calling. The service offers true two-way calling, allowing customers to return calls using their Virtual Phone Number as CallerID.

Each Virtual Phone Number is fully configurable: custom Voicemail greetings, different forwarding numbers, Do Not Disturb hours, and Call Recording. They offer unlimited Call Recordings and Voicemails, so your callers will never hear “Voicemail box is full” and every call you want recorded will be.

Virtual Phone Numbers are available in 95% of the US, much of Canada and 57 other countries including the United Kingdom, Mexico, Spain, Italy, Brazil and others. Calls to those numbers can be forwarded anywhere in the world.

The Virtual Phone Numbers Tossable Digits provides appear as local phone numbers to callers. Customers pay for the minutes used and monthly fee for each Virtual Phone Number, and can have as many disposable Virtual Phone Numbers as they want. Subscription plans start at $6.99/month which includes one Virtual Phone Number and 60 minutes.
